00019 {
00020     listeningPredators.clear();
00021 }

00023 void PreyManager::registerPredator(Predator* predator)
00024 {

00033 void PreyManager::preyAttacked(Prey* prey)
00034 {

00036     stateChangedPrey.remove(prey);

00054 void PreyManager::update()
00055 {
00056 
00057     list<Predator*>::iterator iter;
00058     for (iter = listeningPredators.begin(); iter != listeningPredators.end(); ++iter)
00059         (*iter)->update(movedPrey, stateChangedPrey);
00060 
00061 
00062     while (starvedPredators.begin() != starvedPredators.end())
00063     {
00064         Predator* pred = starvedPredators.back();
00065         starvedPredators.pop_back();
00066         listeningPredators.remove(pred);
00067         SimulationManager::get()->getActiveEnvironment()->killPredator(pred);
00068     }
00069     starvedPredators.clear();
00070 
00071     movedPrey.clear();
00072     stateChangedPrey.clear();
00073 }
